Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored a team-high 32 points
Brandon Miller banked in a 32-foot desperation heave at the shot clock buzzer
Miles Bridges tossed in bucket number two
LaMelo Ball went bucket for bucket with the Suns superstars
Nick Smith Jr. returned the favor with a half court alley oop to Bridges
LaMelo Ball hit a dagger three to turn around a rough fourth quarter
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball made a compelling argument to start the All-Star Game
Bridges redeemed himself after struggling against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets will return to the court on Thursday night for a matchup against LeBron James, Anthony Davis, and the Los Angeles Lakers
The Suns host Trae Young and the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday
Others: Brandon Miller struggled with a couple of rushed turnovers early in the fourth
Mark Williams almost pulled off a miraculous highlight with Ball and Miller
